snippet.title: Pre-Fortress 2 - Spawn Room Turret Demonstration
snippet.description:
Showcase by @wolfcl0ck. Used with permission.
Spawn Room Turrets are a newly revived feature in Pre-Fortress 2 0.7! For mappers, you can use these turrets as an added way to keep your spawn rooms safe, or make them destructible and add them as an automated hazard for players to disable.
Download Pre-Fortress 2 Here: http://prefortress.com/download/
Discord: https://discord.gg/D3Fzdew
